1124770997687787521.text: It has been a while but here is another small update for my Unity plugin RecordAndRepeat. Improving the overall plugin accessibility by code.  https://github.com/fx-lange/unity-record-and-repeat/releases/latest … RecordAndRepeat supports recording of custom data and playback via the Unity Timeline.
